name: fun
summary: a collection of fun and educational commands.

name: learning
summary: a collection of commands that will let you learn something new when used.

name: mongo
summary: a collection of commands that don't have much in common other than directly interacting with the database.

name: music
summary: a collection of commands that allow you to manipulate Beat Bot's music functionality

name: sports
summary: A collection of commands related to both sports and esports.

name: spotify
summary: Commands that interact with spotify's api.

name: steam
summary: a collection of commands that interact with steam's api and allow you to look up deals and news for games

name: tabletop
summary: a collection of commands that aid TTRPGs on the server as well as log adventures for posterity

name: util
summary: a collection of useful commands that offer simple tools and solutions for simple problems or situations
